SML_FBError (STRUCT)
SML_FBError (STRUCT)
Â¶
TYPE SML_FBERROR : STRUCT
Represents an error event that occurred while executing an SML function block
InOut:
Name
Type
Comment
eError
SML_ERROR
The error identifier
pbyErrorInstance
POINTER TO BYTE
A pointer to the FB instance that detected the error
tTimeStamp
TIME
The time of the error event

rows.Name: pbyErrorInstance
rows.Comment: A pointer to the FB instance that detected the error

rows.Name: tTimeStamp
rows.Comment: The time of the error event
